content.rendered:
SEMI PERMANENT BROWS MAKEUP

Previous
Next

NANO HAIR STROKES BROWS

Nano Hair Stroke Brows is a technique used to create flawless eyebrows that last. Microblading is a very popular treatment due to the natural realistic results, the only downside is that the pigment doesn’t retain well in the skin and if you have oily skin then the pigment with fade even quicker. Nano hair stroke brows uses a machine with an ultra-fine needle that is infused with micro pigmented – pigments. Creating the nano hair strokes with a machine instead of a manual tool still leaves you with the most natural crisp hair strokes, without the worry of them fading too soon. We use the highest quality products made in Russia and USA. Nano hair stroke brows are the new microblading, but better! What are you waiting for? Get booked in for nano hair stroke brows today!

$ 550
  • Treatment time: 2-2.5 hours
  • Results: lasts 2-3 years
  • Numbing cream: Topical numbing is applied
  • Pain: None to Mild
  • Number of treatments: A follow up appointment is included after 4-6 weeks
Book now
Previous
Next

POWDER/OMBRE POWDER BROWS

Powder Ombre Brows are the perfect option if you love how your eyebrows look when you use powdered makeup to fill them in. The pigment is deposited into the brow area using a machine; the brow’s tail is made dark and bold, and the closer we get to the inner part of the brow, we fade the pigment out to replicate the look of powdered makeup, to give you the perfect ombre effect. The technique slowly builds up the pigments to create a soft-shaded brow. Powder ombre brows are great for clients that have more oily skin or want a makeup look.

$ 400-500
  • Treatment time: 2-2.5 hours
  • Results: lasts 2-3 years
  • Numbing cream: Topical numbing is applied
  • Pain: None to Mild
  • Number of treatments: A follow up appointment is included after 4-6 weeks
Book now
Cost depending on the brow artist selection

COMBINATION BROWS

Combination brows technique a combination of two forms of semi-permanent techniques: nano hair stroke brows and powder brows.

$ 450-550
  • Treatment time: 2-2.5 hours
  • Results: lasts 2-3 years
  • Numbing cream: Topical numbing is applied
  • Pain: None to Mild
  • Number of treatments: A follow up appointment is included after 4-6 weeks
Book now
Cost depending on the brow artist selection

We will offer a free brow consultation for you

If you are not sure which brow technique is good for you or you have more questions, We will offer a free brow consultation for you

In-person Brow Consultation

During your consultation, we will work with you to discuss your goals, lifestyle, shape of your existing brows. It also includes the problem areas you wish to address. Bringing reference photos of your desired brow shape is highly recommended and greatly appreciated. Our brow artist will advise and show examples of brow shapes that will work with each client’s face shape and brow type. If you have any questions about which procedure to choose, our brow artist can direct you towards the best option for you.

BOOK A FREE IN-PERSON BROW CONSULTATION NOW

Complimentary Online

If you would like, email a picture of your natural eyebrows (without makeup) to our email address we will get back to you within 48 hours. After we send you our recommendation, you may book for your appointment on our website.

When you make an appointment to have the procedure done, we will first do a consult, design your eyebrows, and ensure that you have agreed with the shape and color prior to the microblading process

GET A FREE CONSULTATION

TREATMENT CARE & FAQ’S

Pre care

Please make sure you are not taking any blood thinners

No alcohol 24 hours prior

You may not be pregnant or currently breastfeeding

No antibiotics 2 months prior

Post care

Following your appointment, do not get your brows wet for the first 48 hours, avoid heavy sweating – and apply cream your service provider will give you after your service.

What will I need to do before my appointment?

Please arrive at your appointment without any eyebrow makeup, you will also be filling out paperwork upon arrival.

Will I be able to wear make-up?

During the healing process, you should not be applying any makeup to or around your eyebrows, this will affect your natural healing and may cause irritation.

Is Nano hair stroke brows the same as microbalding?

Nano hair stroke brows is a better alternative to Microblading, unlike microblading Nano hair stroke brows requires a much finer needle allowing less scaring to the tissue of the skin, creating a much more natural finished appearance and will last 2-3 years, Nano hair stroke brows will not discolor your brows overtime.
